name: ČeskýrozhlasRadiožurnál–zprávy
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A news briefing from the Czech Republic to keep you up-to-date with current events. Updated hourly. In Czech language only. For news in English language, try „Radio Prague“. For news in German, try „Radio Prag“.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” to hear your briefing. To move Český rozhlas Radiožurnál to the top of your flash news briefing go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing”.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
